Label: Room4
Description: Smaller chamber with only exit to the south. There is a skelly man on the ground holding a big key.

Items.Name: Key
Items.Description: It probably unlocks something! That's generally how keys work!

UniqueActions.Text: The stream is definitely made of water. Nice detective work!
You've already lost both feet. You think it might be better to not tempt fate.
You try to get the stream, but the stream gets you instead!¬Something in the stream has eaten one of your feet.
The sign in front of you says 'Look out for mailboxes. They are dangerous.'
The frog says 'Got that taco yet? Sure could USE me a TACO, chum!'
The frog says 'Man, I could really go for a taco. If you bring me a taco, I will grant you unlimited power.'
